Title: Extends the hearing requirement in guardianship matters from 28 days to 35 days
Summary: Extends the hearing requirement in guardianship matters from 28 days to 35 days.
LawCode: Amd ยง81.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to extending the hearing requirement in guardianship matters from 28 days to 35 days
